name: AdminBar Remover
author: Sujin 수진 Choi

sections.description: Hide and show the adminbar by clicking WP logo. It works on front pages only. This plugin is basically for front-end developers who want to check design instantly.
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘AdminBar Remover’
  3. Activate AdminBar Remover from your Plugins page.

From WordPress.org

  1. Download 2D Tag Cloud.
  2. Upload the ‘adminbar-remover’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate AdminBar Remover from your Plugins page.
